verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* news \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w* \w reached|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*—\w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foothills|strong="H8219"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* along \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w coast|strong="H2348"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* (\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, Amorites, \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*)—

\w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* wage \w war|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, having \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w had|strong="H3091"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*,

\w acted|strong="H6213"\w* deceptively \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w envoys|strong="H6737"\w*, carrying \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w worn-out|strong="H1087"\w* \w sacks|strong="H8242"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w old|strong="H1087"\w* \w wineskins|strong="H4997"\w*, cracked \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w mended|strong="H6887"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* put \w worn|strong="H1087"\w*, \w patched|strong="H2921"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* threadbare \w clothing|strong="H8008"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* bodies, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* supply \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* moldy.

\w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distant|strong="H7350"\w* land; please \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w*.”

But \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, “Perhaps \w you|strong="H7130"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w near|strong="H7130"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w*. How can \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w*?”

“We \w are|strong="H5650"\w* your \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*,” they said \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3091"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* asked them, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H4310"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* where \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H4310"\w* come \w from|strong="H5650"\w*?”

“\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w distant|strong="H7350"\w* land,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reports|strong="H8089"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorites \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*—\w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* reigned \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* land told \w us|strong="H3027"\w*, ‘\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*; \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*: \w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. Please \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*.’

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* ours \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w warm|strong="H2525"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* packed \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* moldy.

These \w wineskins|strong="H4997"\w* \w were|strong="H2009"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w when|strong="H4390"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H1086"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w they|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* cracked. \w And|strong="H1870"\w* these \w clothes|strong="H8008"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w worn|strong="H1086"\w* \w out|strong="H1234"\w* \w from|strong="H3196"\w* \w our|strong="H4390"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w long|strong="H7230"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel sampled \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6718"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w counsel|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* let \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Gibeonites, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Israelites learned \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H7138"\w*, \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*—\w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Chephirah|strong="H3716"\w*, Beeroth, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w attack|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w grumbled|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* answered, “\w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5060"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w them|strong="H5060"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w how|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w treat|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w continued|strong="H1961"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w woodcutters|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w carriers|strong="H7579"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w kept|strong="H2421"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w promise|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Gibeonites \w and|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* deceive \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w telling|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*, \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* fact \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* perpetually serve \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w woodcutters|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w carriers|strong="H7579"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Gibeonites \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* clearly \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w wipe|strong="H8045"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H2896"\w* \w seems|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* Joshua \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Gibeonites.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w woodcutters|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w carriers|strong="H7579"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* choose.
